settings.title: MEDIA MENTIONS
settings.description: A few places that have highlighted Ativafit products — curated mentions, awards, and roundups.

settings.heading: The 5 Best Adjustable Dumbbells for Home Workouts, According to Trainers
settings.text: "This is a good range in weight for beginners to more experienced individuals — not too many people outgrow 71.5 pounds," says Chris Parnell, a National Academy of Sports Medicine-certified personal trainer at Equinox and Soho Strength Lab in New York City.

settings.heading: Save Space In Your Home Gym With The ATIVAFIT Adjustable Dumbbells
settings.text: To help consolidate space in your home, the ATIVAFIT Adjustable Dumbbell is a great pickup. It's compact, durable, and easy to use. You can do a ton of workouts with it.

settings.heading: 6 top-rated adjustable dumbbells for home gyms for 2022
settings.text: The Ativafit Adjustable Dumbbells are another good option for those looking for a bit more weight.

settings.heading: 10 Stellar Sets of Adjustable Dumbbells for Your Home Gym in 2022
settings.text: With just a push and slide, you can easily change your weight setting in 2.5-pound increments.
